title: Distribution of deliberative democracy index
subtitle: Based on the expert estimates and index by [V-Dem](#dod:v-dem), weighted by countries' populations. It combines information on voting rights, the freedom and fairness of elections, freedoms of association and expression, as well as the extent to which citizens and leaders discuss different views and seek the public good. It ranges from 0 to 1 (most democratic).

relatedQuestions.text: How do different approaches score democracy across the world?
